channel.title: Comments on: Parties
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: No. My friend's company has been hosting my sites for years and they recently went out of business. I'm switching over to A2 hosting. It is about $80/year, which is a pretty good deal for what you get.
item.content:encoded: No. My friend’s company has been hosting my sites for years and they recently went out of business. I’m switching over to A2 hosting. It is about $80/year, which is a pretty good deal for what you get.

item.title: By: Ryan Houlette
item.dc:creator: Ryan Houlette
item.description: Are you changing web hosts because of the Blogger ftp-posting change, by any chance? I'm still trying to figure out what to do about that for my website.
item.content:encoded: Are you changing web hosts because of the Blogger ftp-posting change, by any chance? I’m still trying to figure out what to do about that for my website.
